page.title: 01SELE FARM ESTATE
page.content: { { }The Sele Farm Estate is situated not too near the town centre but in the right place to be a good housing estate. It is set off the main B1000 road & has a good bus service. Many of the houses belong to the council but gradually more & more of them are being bought by their tenants. The estate's shops are always busy & are well used by the local people. Quite a large number of houses have their own garages nearby or adjoining the houses. This shows that quite a lot of people have cars. Many also walk or use bicycles to get about & to keep fit. Houses in some part of the estate look different from others. This is because they were built at different times & of different types of brick. -----continued on page 2---------
